install:
run install -d "$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR/"

run mv "$PACKAGE_WORKING_DIR/res/xml"  "$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR/"
run mv "$PACKAGE_WORKING_DIR/res/xslt" "$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR/"

run cd "$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR/"

run cp xml/4.2/catalog.xml xml/4.1/catalog.xml
run mv xml/5.0/docbook-5.0/* xml/5.0/

run xmlcatalog --noout --create catalog.xml

find xml -mindepth 2 -name catalog.xml -exec xmlcatalog --noout --add nextCatalog '' "file://$PWD/{}" catalog.xml \;

################################################################################################################

DEST="$PWD/xslt/1.0/nons"

xmlcatalog --noout --add nextCatalog '' "file://$DEST/catalog.xml" catalog.xml

for ver in 1.79.2 current
do
    for rewriteItem in rewriteSystem rewriteURI
    do
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "https://cdn.docbook.org/release/xsl-nons/$ver"   "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/$ver" "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
    done
done

################################################################################################################

DEST="$PWD/xslt/1.0/ns"

xmlcatalog --noout --add nextCatalog '' "file://$DEST/catalog.xml" catalog.xml

for ver in 1.79.2 current
do
    for rewriteItem in rewriteSystem rewriteURI
    do
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "https://cdn.docbook.org/release/xsl/$ver"           "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
        xmlcatalog --noout --add "$rewriteItem" "http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl-ns/$ver" "file://$DEST" catalog.xml
    done
done

dep-pkg: libmp3lame libsamplerate libtheora libvorbis libspeex librav1e libdav1d libx264 libx265 libopus libxvid libsoxr libvpx libwebp libtiff libpng libjpeg-turbo libgif libsrt libzimg libzmq libxml2 libarchive libsdl2 xorg-libxv
install:
unset CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS

case $TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH in
    aarch64) CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS='--enable-neon' ;;
    arm64)   CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS='--enable-neon' ;;
    armv7a)  CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS='--enable-neon' ;;
    i686)    CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS='--disable-asm' ;;
esac

if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME" = macos ] ; then
    CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS="$CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS --enable-videotoolbox --enable-audiotoolbox"

    CLANG_VERSION_MAJOR="$("$CC" -E -dM - < /dev/null | grep __clang_major__ | cut -d ' ' -f3)"

    # https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/40159
    if [ "$CLANG_VERSION_MAJOR" -ge 15 ] ; then
        export LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS -Wl,-ld_classic"
    fi

    TARGET_OS=darwin
else
    TARGET_OS="$TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME"
fi

gsed -i 's|-lxvidcore|-lxvidcore -lm|' configure
gsed -i "/SDL2_CONFIG=/c SDL2_CONFIG='$libsdl2_INSTALL_DIR/bin/sdl2-config'" configure

export PROXIED_CC_ARGS="$PROXIED_CC_ARGS -lgomp -lm"

if run ./configure \
    --prefix="$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR" \
    --sysroot="$SYSROOT" \
    --ar="$AR" \
    --as="$CC" \
    --ld="$CC" \
    --cc="$CC" \
    --cxx="$CXX" \
    --nm="$NM" \
    --ranlib="$RANLIB" \
    --strip="$STRIP" \
    --pkg-config="$PKG_CONFIG" \
    --arch="$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH" \
    --target-os="$TARGET_OS" \
    --enable-pic \
    --enable-static \
    --disable-shared \
    --enable-ffplay \
    --enable-ffprobe \
    --enable-openssl \
    --enable-version3 \
    --enable-libmp3lame \
    --enable-libtheora \
    --enable-libvorbis \
    --enable-libspeex \
    --enable-librav1e \
    --enable-libdav1d \
    --enable-libopus \
    --enable-libwebp \
    --enable-libzimg \
    --enable-libx264 \
    --enable-libx265 \
    --enable-libxvid \
    --enable-libsoxr \
    --enable-libvpx \
    --enable-libsrt \
    --enable-libxml2 \
    --enable-lzma \
    --enable-sdl \
    --enable-gpl \
    --disable-jni \
    --disable-doc \
    --disable-debug \
    --disable-vulkan \
    --disable-mediacodec \
    --disable-libfdk-aac \
    $CONFIGURE_EXTRA_ARGS ; then
    gmakew clean
    gmakew install V=1
    run cp ffbuild/config.log .
else
    cat ffbuild/config.log
    return 1
fi

# https://github.com/randombit/botan/issues/2239

if "$CXX" --version | grep -q 'Free Software Foundation' ; then
    unset GCC_VERSION_MAJOR

    GCC_VERSION_MAJOR=$("$CXX" -E -dM - < /dev/null | grep __GNUC__ | cut -d ' ' -f3)

fi

unset GMAKE_EXTRA_ARGS

    V="${KV#*:}"

    A="$(pkg-config --cflags "$V")"

done

dosetup:
if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME" = openbsd ] ; then
    sed -i 's|-Wl,-z,defs||' Configurations/shared-info.pl

    if isCrossBuild ; then
        export LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS -fuse-ld=lld"
        CONFIG_ARGS="$CONFIG_ARGS no-devcryptoeng"
    fi
fi
install:
unset OS_COMPILER

if isCrossBuild ; then
    CMD=./Configure

    case $TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME in
        linux)
            case $TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH in
                riscv64) OS_COMPILER='linux64-riscv64' ;;
                s390x)   OS_COMPILER='linux64-s390x'   ;;
                *)       OS_COMPILER="linux-$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH"
            esac
            ;;
        macos)
            OS_COMPILER="darwin64-$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH"
            ;;
        *bsd)
            case $TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH in
                amd64)  OS_COMPILER='BSD-x86_64' ;;
                *)      OS_COMPILER="BSD-$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH"
            esac
    esac
else
    CMD=./config
fi

# https://github.com/openssl/openssl/blob/master/INSTALL.md
run "$CMD" no-tests no-ssl3 no-ssl3-method no-zlib --libdir=lib --openssldir=/etc/ssl --prefix="$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR" "$OS_COMPILER"
gmakew clean
gmakew build_libs
gmakew install_dev

dopatch:
LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS="$libedit_INCLUDE_DIR;$libedit_INCLUDE_DIR/editline"
LibEdit_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libedit | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > ../cmake/Modules/FindLibEdit.cmake <<EOF
set(LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS "$LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS")
set(LibEdit_LIBRARIES    "$LibEdit_LIBRARIES")
set(LibEdit_FOUND TRUE)

if (NOT TARGET  LibEdit::LibEdit)
    add_library(LibEdit::LibEdit INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(LibEdit::LibEdit PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "\${LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "\${LibEdit_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(LibEdit REQUIRED_VARS LibEdit_LIBRARIES LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR LibEdit_VERSION_STRING)
mark_as_advanced(LibEdit_INCLUDE_DIRS LibEdit_LIBRARIES)
EOF

sedInPlace '/find_library(LibEdit_LIBRARIES/c set(LibEdit_LIBRARIES "${PC_LIBEDIT_LINK_LIBRARIES}")' ../cmake/Modules/FindLibEdit.cmake
sedInPlace '/IMPORTED_LOCATION/c INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES "${LibEdit_LIBRARIES}"'                    ../cmake/Modules/FindLibEdit.cmake

sedInPlace '/find_package(LibXml2/a set(LIBXML2_FOUND TRUE)'                                      ../lldb/cmake/modules/LLDBConfig.cmake

####################################################################

CURL_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libcurl | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > cmake/FindCURL.cmake <<EOF
set(CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libcurl_INCLUDE_DIR")
set(CURL_LIBRARIES    "$CURL_LIBRARIES")

if (NOT TARGET  CURL::libcurl)
    add_library(CURL::libcurl INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(CURL::libcurl PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "\${CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "\${CURL_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(CURL REQUIRED_VARS CURL_LIBRARIES CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR CURL_VERSION)
mark_as_advanced(CURL_INCLUDE_DIRS CURL_LIBRARIES)
EOF

####################################################################

TIFF_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libtiff-4 | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > cmake/FindTIFF.cmake <<EOF
set(TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libtiff_INCLUDE_DIR")
set(TIFF_LIBRARIES    "$TIFF_LIBRARIES")

if (NOT TARGET  TIFF::TIFF)
    add_library(TIFF::TIFF INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(TIFF::TIFF PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "\${TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "\${TIFF_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(TIFF REQUIRED_VARS TIFF_LIBRARIES TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR TIFF_VERSION)
mark_as_advanced(TIFF_INCLUDE_DIRS TIFF_LIBRARIES)
EOF

####################################################################

LIBARCHIVE_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l libarchive | tr ' ' ';')"

cat > cmake/FindLibArchive.cmake <<EOF
set(LibArchive_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libarchive_INCLUDE_DIR")
set(LibArchive_LIBRARIES    "$LIBARCHIVE_LIBRARIES")

if (NOT TARGET  LibArchive::LibArchive)
    add_library(LibArchive::LibArchive INTERFACE IMPORTED)
    set_target_properties(LibArchive::LibArchive PROPERTIES
        INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${LibArchive_INCLUDE_DIRS}"
        INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES      "${LibArchive_LIBRARIES}"
    )
endif()

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(LibArchive REQUIRED_VARS LibArchive_LIBRARIES LibArchive_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR LibArchive_VERSION)
mark_as_advanced(LibArchive_INCLUDE_DIRS LibArchive_LIBRARIES)
EOF

####################################################################

Leptonica_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l lept | tr ' ' ';')"
Leptonica_VERSION="$(pkg-config --modversion lept)"

cat > cmake/FindLeptonica.cmake <<EOF
set(Leptonica_INCLUDE_DIRS "$libleptonica_INCLUDE_DIR/leptonica")
set(Leptonica_LIBRARIES    "$Leptonica_LIBRARIES")
set(Leptonica_VERSION      "$Leptonica_VERSION")

include(FindPackageHandleStandardArgs)
find_package_handle_standard_args(Leptonica REQUIRED_VARS Leptonica_LIBRARIES Leptonica_INCLUDE_DIRS VERSION_VAR Leptonica_VERSION)
mark_as_advanced(Leptonica_INCLUDE_DIRS Leptonica_LIBRARIES)
EOF

####################################################################

PANGOCAIRO_LIBRARIES="$(pkg-config --libs-only-l pangocairo) -lintl -lpixman-1 -lffi  -lpcre2-8"
echo "$PANGOCAIRO_LIBRARIES=$PANGOCAIRO_LIBRARIES"
gsed -i "s|PkgConfig::PANGO|$PANGOCAIRO_LIBRARIES|" src/training/CMakeLists.txt

####################################################################

gsed -i '/find_package(Leptonica/s|CONFIG||' CMakeLists.txt

 }

 {
    va_list ap;

EOF

summary: A package manager for the Zig programming language
install:
if [ "$TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME" = macos ] ; then
    # https://zig.guide/build-system/cross-compilation/
    if [ $TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH = arm64 ] ; then
        ZIG_BUILD_TARGET='aarch64-macos'
    else
        ZIG_BUILD_TARGET=$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH-macos
    fi
else
        ZIG_BUILD_TARGET=$TARGET_PLATFORM_ARCH-$TARGET_PLATFORM_NAME
fi

case $PROFILE in
    debug)   ZIG_BUILD_EXTRA_ARGS='-Dmode=Debug       -Dstrip=false' ;;
    release) ZIG_BUILD_EXTRA_ARGS='-Dmode=ReleaseSafe -Dstrip=true'  ;;
esac

if [ "$LOG_LEVEL" -ge 1 ] ; then
    ZIG_BUILD_EXTRA_ARGS="$ZIG_BUILD_EXTRA_ARGS --verbose"
fi


run zig build $ZIG_BUILD_EXTRA_ARGS "-Dtarget=$ZIG_BUILD_TARGET" "-Dtag=$PACKAGE_VERSION" --prefix "$PACKAGE_INSTALL_DIR"
